author: ogusakov
msg: [MERCURY-83] metadata reading is excluded from stream verification

author: awiner
msg: SHINDIG-902: Support full expression syntax, not just "."
- Add JUEL, and use its implementation of the javax.el API.
- As there's no support for escaping "." in property names, switch from
- Since there's no support for ['...'] at the top-level, switch from
Benchmarks show this implementation is ca. 10% slower than the hand-coded version for concatenation and property access.

author: hlship
msg: TAP5-349: Tapestry silently allows a MarkupWriter to set a series of root elements, ignoring all but the last. A document should only have a single root element and this situation should be an immediate exception.
